reviews.text: Great location easy to get to by foot, only gave 3 stars due to lack of trains stopping especially on a Sunday

Poor planning has left the Station far our from the Town with non existent bus links. Then there’s the issue of the lack of trains stopping. Had to travel to Plymouth in order to travel North adding an extra 50 mins to my journey or a Two hour wait in a dilapidated cold and windy bus stop style shelter. The old excuse was the platforms where to short. Now with lockable carriages that doesn’t carry.  A excellent example of what’s wrong with privatisation !!!!
Well it isn't perfect, tucked out of the town, but it does mean this town has a rail link that makes ready for tourists. So check the apps that give you live updates & let your journey start there.
Poor station. Dimly lit, information boards often not working, unreliable trains few and far between.
